translations: n．遍历：在计算机科学和数据结构中，按照某种顺序访问数据结构中的所有元素的过程。
· There are different types of tree traversals, such as pre-order, in-order, and post-order.
树的遍历有不同的类型，如先序遍历、中序遍历和后序遍历。

sentences.sentence: Adjacency matrix of the storage structure of the graph for the DFS and BFS traversals.
sentences.translation: 对以邻接矩阵为存储结构的图进行DFS和BFS遍历。

sentences.sentence: Such crashes are almost always caused by modifying the scene graph during the cull or draw traversals.
sentences.translation: 在拣选和绘制遍历中修改场景，经常会导致这样的崩溃。

sentences.sentence: When evaluating the modification function at a node, all of the parent-node traversals are on the stack.
sentences.translation: 在对一个节点的修改函数求值时，所有父节点的遍历都将进入堆栈。
